column4: What's a good program to capture video and images from a webcam in ubuntu?
There are so many, is kinda like what is best, there is now best, there is what works for you and so on...
ok let me rephrase, whats a program that easily lets me capture pictures and video then
I have seen many speak kindly about VLC, Audacity,Totem and a wm thing,,I use Totem and some KDE applications.
